concept.title: MME support for control of SGd/SGs SMS LI report (Feature f10319-01)
concept.shortdesc: This feature enhances feature Lawful interception for SMS (Feature f11004-04).

conbody.p: With this feature, control parameter smsLiReport is added to control SMS LI report to be sent with possible values none, sgs, sgd or both (sgs and sgd).
